description: OPJU files replaced .OPJ files, which were the primary files used to save projects in all Origin versions before the 2018 version. OPJU files are saved in a unicode format which features performance advantages over the older OPJ file format.

You can open OPJU files with Origin and Origin Viewer. Origin is the primary program used to create, open, and edit OPJU files but Origin Viewer is also commonly used since it is a free, lightweight program that allows you to view and copy information in OPJU projects in Windows and macOS.
To save an OPJU file in Origin, select File â†’ Save project or Save Project As... , name the file, choose the save location, and click Save .
